CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0x941b7f6d2f77bf472f491d96d9fdd14c294b892a.sol#646-675) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0x941b7f6d2f77bf472f491d96d9fdd14c294b892a.sol#660-675)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x941b7f6d2f77bf472f491d96d9fdd14c294b892a.sol#659-675)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x941b7f6d2f77bf472f491d96d9fdd14c294b892a.sol#284-287)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x941b7f6d2f77bf472f491d96d9fdd14c294b892a.sol#183)
